/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of dynamism to the scene. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the view, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
